reviewText: I am an elementary school teacher and I purchased this video for my classroom. The narration is dry and fairly simple. This video is simply a series of short clips observing a few of the creatures found in the soil under a microscope. The content isn't great. This video is educational, but not entertaining. If you are looking for a video for entertainment purposes consider: Life in the Undergrowth. If you are looking for an educational option consider getting some worm bin or leaf material and putting it under a microscope with a document camera attached for the students to see in real life, it is much more engaging. I won't purchase this again as I can make these videos much better myself through a microscope in the lab and a camera.
